exceptions.tactic: pose proof (ub_of_chain (tower T R chain_sup inflation)).
exceptions.exn: The reference inflation was not found in the current environment.
The reference H was not found in the current environment.

original: pose proof (ub_of_chain (tower T R chain_sup inflation)). destruct H as [x Hx]. exists x. intros y Hy. apply (proj1 (Hx y Hy)).
